station_no_data.description: The real-time weather station Meteo Swiss is using ({station}) is no longer offering data.  Currently, the only repair possible involves removing and re-adding the Meteo Swiss integration, selecting a new real-time weather station.  Until this repair is made, all real-time weather sensors and reports will show as unavailable.
